Issue.creator: cclauss
Issue.summary: Typo in variable name: block instead of blocks 0
Issue.description: In https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/release/bddtests/steps/bootstrap_util.py#L1235 the `block.data.data` at the end of the line should be `blocks 0 .data.data` instead. `block` (singular) is an undefined name in this context but `blocks 0 ` (plural) is used earlier on this same line.
